prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Promptbook engine is available as multiple npm packages and a Docker image.  Key packages include `ptbk` (all-in-one bundle), `@promptbook/core`, `@promptbook/utils`, and `@promptbook/cli`.  Specific LLM integrations are provided as separate packages (`@promptbook/openai`, `@promptbook/anthropic-claude`, etc.).

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, npm packages, Docker image, ptbk, @promptbook/core, @promptbook/utils, @promptbook/cli, LLM integrations, @promptbook/openai, @promptbook/anthropic-claude
promptResult.rawPromptContent:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> The Promptbook engine is available as multiple npm packages and a Docker image.  Key packages include `ptbk` (all-in-one bundle), `@promptbook/core`, `@promptbook/utils`, and `@promptbook/cli`.  Specific LLM integrations are provided as separate packages (`@promptbook/openai`, `@promptbook/anthropic-claude`, etc.).
